title: Think Education & Commercial Arts Training College
content:
I have been the Senior Graphic Design Lecturer for the Commercial Arts Training College on the Gold Coast (Queensland Australia), for the last 6 years. CATC has just been acquired by Think Education in the past 12 months.

I am craving any feed back regarding your experiences with our companies,  
possible suggestions for new curriculum

Any comments welcome

CATC is going through rebrand, I will post the stages of development, Stay tuned.

Shane Blackwell
author: sblackwell
